Text.Language: Blessed are all who fear the Lord; who walk in His ways. You shall eat the fruit of your labors; you shall be blessed, and goodness shall be unto you. Your wife shall be as a fruitful vine on the sides of your house; your children as young olive-plants round about your table. Behold, thus shall the man be blessed, who fears the Lord. The Lord shall bless you out of Zion, and you shall see the good things of Jerusalem all the days of your life. And you shall see the children of your children. Peace be upon Israel. ALLELUIA.
